Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 980468 PPX pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the New York City Charter concerning the disposition for the Bronx Criminal Court Facility located at Sherman Avenue and Morris Avenue and East 161st Street and 162nd Street, Borough of Bronx, in Council District No. 16.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council Pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to Section 197d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 980467 PCX pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the site selection and acquisition of real property generally bounded by East 161st and 163rd St and Sherman and Morris Avenues, Borough of Bronx, Council District no. 16, for use as a criminal court facility.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the
Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 980472 ZSX pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Bronx, Council District no. 16 to allow unattended accessory parking garage with a maximum capacity of 320 spaces in portions of the cellar and subcellar.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Section 197d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure, application no. 980470 MMX, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the New York City Charter, changes to the City Map, Borough of Bronx, Council District no. 16.  This application is subject to Council review and action only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by a vote of the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(3) of the Charter and Section 11.20 of the Rules of the Council.

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 980469 ZMX pursuant to Sections 197-c and 197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Bronx, Council District no. 16.
